snippet.title: SEVEN CITIES : TRAILER
snippet.description:
Seven Cities demo trailer 

----
ABOUT THIS GAME
Seven Cities is an Action-RPG which takes place in an urban contemporary world. A near-futur New York full of intrigue. You play as an Outsider along with a robotic companion. Both will evolve through many intensive fights to find the 7 CEROM's

---- 
You can now wishlist on steam, the demo is coming this week ;)
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1832780/Seven_Cities/
----
TO SUPPORT AND FOLLOW US 
Twitter https://twitter.com/imvstudio
Discord https://discord.gg/s6fxwf8y
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/imvgames/
Website studio https://www.imvstudio.fr/
Website Seven Cities https://www.sevencities.fr/
